availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tobias William Staiar (Owen County, Kentucky, saddler.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, saddler. Virginia native. Married Elizabeth Roberts Staiar in Owen County, Kentucky, on August 10, 1843. Father of William F. Staiar. Married Mary W. Roberts Staiar in Owen County on April 14, 1847. Father of Kate F. Staiar. Saddler in Owen County in 1850. Shaver in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 223B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 1.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Owenton, p. 285A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #001943448, p. 621 (on microfilm) (accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272773, p. 199 (on microfilm) (accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Tobias William Staiar (22 May 1816-8 Jan 1918)," Memorial #78816013, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/78816013 (accessed June 16, 2020).
